dialog: The World Machine is everything alright? what just happened?
so you call them "The World Machine" very interesting
Who are you? what did you do to The World Machine?
I'm a virus and i just infected The World Machine
so this is why you call them "The World Machine" because there is a little simulation in here
don't you dare do anything with the simulation
Ugh i can't! it seems like there some sort of protection in here
Is it you? are you the protection?
well let me find that out by infecting you
